title: Finish the Wall
instructions:
In this exercise, you use the `repeat` keyword to add the top layer to a wall.

The final wall should look like this - all the layers other than the top one are already complete. You need to add the final layer of 5 bricks.

![Completed Wall](https://assets.exercism.org/bootcamp/graphics/completed-wall.png)

Things you need to know:

- Each brick is 10 high and 20 wide.
- The `rectangle` function can only appear once in your code!
- Use a loop to draw all 5 bricks efficiently.

### Functions

You need one function for this exercise:

- `rectangle(left, top, width, height, color)`: Draws a rectangle with the given color.
hints: Use a loop that runs 5 times to draw all the bricks
Track the x position with a variable that increases by 20 each iteration
All bricks have the same y position (0), width (20), and height (10)
The rectangle function should only appear once inside the loop
